scripts.postinstall: npm run install-gitbook && npm run install-repl
scripts.install-gitbook: replace --silent ',"elm-repl"' '' book.json && gitbook install && replace --silent '"youtube"' '"youtube","elm-repl"' book.json
scripts.install-repl: cd repl && npm link && npm i && npm run build && cd ../ && npm link gitbook-plugin-elm-repl
scripts.build: rimraf _book && rimraf docs && gitbook build && mv _book docs && rimraf docs/**/*.md && replace --silent '検索すると入力' '検索' docs/*.html docs/**/*.html && cpx favicon.ico _book/gitbook/images/
